agent_conditions.description: Conditions that restrict when the ticket form is available to agents.

end_user_conditions.description: Conditions that restrict when the ticket form is available to end users.

created_at.description: The date and time when the ticket form was created.

name.description: The name of the ticket form.

display_name.description: The display name of the ticket form.

raw_display_name.description: The raw display name of the ticket form.

position.description: The order position of the ticket form within a list.

raw_name.description: The raw name of the ticket form.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the ticket form was last updated.

active.description: Indicates if the ticket form is currently active.

default.description: Indicates if the ticket form is the default form.

in_all_brands.description: Indicates if the ticket form is available in all brands.

end_user_visible.description: Indicates if the ticket form is visible to end users.

url.description: The URL to access the ticket form.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ticket form.

restricted_brand_ids.description: An array of brand IDs under which the ticket form is restricted to be used.

ticket_field_ids.description: An array of ticket field IDs that are associated with the ticket form.
